Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details:
TENSIONS IN THE [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreChaosMarch],CHAOS MARCH]] - SPOTLIGHT CARVER V!


[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreOutreach],OUTREACH]]: New tensions in the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreChaosMarch],Chaos March]] threaten to again spark fighting between former comrades. On [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCarverV],Carver V]], pro-[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreKatherineSteiner],Katrina]] and pro-[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreVictorSD],Victor]] officers have carefully separated their commands into [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreLyranAlliance],Lyran]] and [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHouseDavion],Federated Suns]] military containment zones.


Would you like to know more?

Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details:
TENSIONS IN THE [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreChaosMarch],CHAOS MARCH]] - SPOTLIGHT CARVER V!


[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreOutreach],OUTREACH]]: Meanwhile, In a series of daring raids, a bandit army consisting of tanks and light BattleMechs seized several Steiner outposts across the planet, stealing supplies and capturing several weapon facilities. While Archon [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreKatherineSteiner],Katrina Steiner]] has rejected sending additional Lyran Alliance forces, she has instead put calls out for mercenaries to assist Steiner forces on the planet.
